◆ ks_print_seqcollection()

void ks_print_seqcollection ( KS_SEQ_COLLECTION *  seqcollection,
FILE *  fp 
)

Print out the duration of each sequence module in the sequence collection to a file pointer

Besides printing out the duration of each sequence module, it will also show the number of occurences of each sequence module each TR. However, for this to be correct ks_eval_seqcollection_resetninst() should first be called followed by one call to the sequence's sliceloop function to increment each .seqctrl.nseqinstances field. See e.g. GEReq_eval_checkTR_SAR().

Parameters
[in]seqcollectionCollection of all sequence modules (KS_SEQ_COLLECTION). C.f. ks_eval_addtoseqcollection()
[in]fpFile pointer to file to write to
Returns
void
3621  {
3622  int i;
3623 
3624  /* duration based on the sequence collection struct */
3625  fprintf(fp, "\n----------------------------------------------\n");
3626  fprintf(fp, "Sequence modules in the sequence collection:\n");
3627  for (i = 0; i < seqcollection->numseq; i++) {
3628  fprintf(fp, "%s: %dx %d us = %d\n", seqcollection->seqctrlptr[i]->description, seqcollection->seqctrlptr[i]->nseqinstances, seqcollection->seqctrlptr[i]->duration,
3629  seqcollection->seqctrlptr[i]->nseqinstances * seqcollection->seqctrlptr[i]->duration);
3630  }
3631  fprintf(fp, "Sum of durations: %d us\n", ks_eval_seqcollection_gettotalduration(seqcollection));
3632  fprintf(fp, "----------------------------------------------\n\n");
3633  fflush(fp);
3634 
3635  return;
3636 } /* ks_print_seqcollection() */

◆ ks_print_read()

void ks_print_read ( KS_READ  read,
FILE *  fp 
)

Writes out the contents of a KS_READ sequence object for debugging

If 2nd argument is stderr or stdout, the printed result will be seen in WTools for simulation. On the MR system, stderr will show up in one of the mgd_term windows. A file pointer (opened with e.g. fp = fopen("/usr/g/mrraw/myname.txt","w")) saves a text file to disk

Parameters
[in]readA KS_READ object to be printed
[in]fpA file pointer (or stderr)
Returns
void
3676  {
3677  if (a.description == NULL || a.duration == 0)
3678  return;
3679  fprintf(fp, "%s.duration: %d\n", a.description, a.duration);
3680  fprintf(fp, "%s.rbw: %g\n", a.description, a.rbw);
3681  fprintf(fp, "%s.filt.decimation: %g\n", a.description, a.filt.decimation);
3682  fprintf(fp, "%s.filt.tdaq: %d\n", a.description, a.filt.tdaq);

◆ ks_print_trap()

void ks_print_trap ( KS_TRAP  trap,
FILE *  fp 
)

Writes out the contents of a KS_TRAP sequence object for debugging

If 2nd argument is stderr or stdout, the printed result will be seen in WTools for simulation. On the MR system, stderr will show up in one of the mgd_term windows. A file pointer (opened with e.g. fp = fopen("/usr/g/mrraw/myname.txt","w")) saves a text file to disk

Parameters
[in]trapA KS_TRAP object to be printed
[in]fpA file pointer (or stderr)
Returns
void
3691  {
3692  if (t.description == NULL || t.duration == 0)
3693  return;
3694  fprintf(fp, "%s.amp: %g\n", t.description, t.amp);
3695  fprintf(fp, "%s.ramptime: %d\n", t.description, t.ramptime);
3696  fprintf(fp, "%s.plateautime: %d\n", t.description, t.plateautime);
3697  fprintf(fp, "%s.duration: %d\n", t.description , t.duration);
3698  fprintf(fp, "%s.area: %g\n", t.description, t.area);
3699  fflush(fp);
3700 }

int plateautime

◆ ks_print_rf()

void ks_print_rf ( KS_RF  rf,
FILE *  fp 
)

Writes out the contents of a KS_RF sequence object for debugging

If 2nd argument is stderr or stdout, the printed result will be seen in WTools for simulation. On the MR system, stderr will show up in one of the mgd_term windows. A file pointer (opened with e.g. fp = fopen("/usr/g/mrraw/myname.txt","w")) saves a text file to disk

Parameters
[in]rfA KS_RF object to be printed
[in]fpA file pointer (or stderr)
Returns
void
3796  {
3797  if (r.rfpulse.activity == 0) {
3798  return;
3799  }
3800 
3801  fprintf(fp, "\nKS_RF (%s):\n", r.rfwave.description);
3802  fprintf(fp, "%s\n", r.designinfo);
3803  switch (r.role) {
3804  case KS_RF_ROLE_NOTSET: fprintf(fp, "role: KS_RF_ROLE_NOTSET\n"); break;
3805  case KS_RF_ROLE_EXC: fprintf(fp, "role: KS_RF_ROLE_EXC\n"); break;
3806  case KS_RF_ROLE_REF: fprintf(fp, "role: KS_RF_ROLE_REF\n"); break;
3807  case KS_RF_ROLE_CHEMSAT: fprintf(fp, "role: KS_RF_ROLE_CHEMSAT\n"); break;
3808  case KS_RF_ROLE_SPSAT: fprintf(fp, "role: KS_RF_ROLE_SPSAT\n"); break;
3809  case KS_RF_ROLE_INV: fprintf(fp, "role: KS_RF_ROLE_INV\n"); break;
3810  }
3811  fprintf(fp, "rfwave.res: %d\n", r.rfwave.res);
3812  fprintf(fp, "rfwave.duration: %d\n", r.rfwave.duration);
3813  fprintf(fp, "amp: %g\n", r.amp);
3814  fprintf(fp, "flip: %g\n", r.flip);
3815  fprintf(fp, "bw: %g\n", r.bw);
3816  fprintf(fp, "cf_offset: %g\n", r.cf_offset);
3817  fprintf(fp, "start2iso: %d\n", r.start2iso);
3818  fprintf(fp, "iso2end: %d\n", r.iso2end);
3819 
3820  ks_print_rfpulse(r.rfpulse, fp);
3821 
3822  if (r.rfwave.res == 0)
3823  fprintf(fp, " rfwave: OFF\n");
3824  else
3825  fprintf(fp, " rfwave: Waveform assigned\n");
3826 
3827  if (r.thetawave.res == 0)
3828  fprintf(fp, " thetawave: OFF\n");
3829  else
3830  fprintf(fp, " thetawave: Waveform assigned\n");
3831 
3832  fflush(fp);
3833 
3834 } /* ks_print_rf */

If 2nd argument is stderr or stdout, the printed result will be seen in WTools for simulation. On the MR system, stderr will show up in one of the mgd_term windows. A file pointer (opened with e.g. fp = fopen("/usr/g/mrraw/myname.txt","w")) saves a text file to disk

3839  {
3840

3842  return;
3843  }

3855  }

◆ ks_eval_clear_readwave()

int ks_eval_clear_readwave ( KS_READWAVE *  readwave)
3862  {
3863  KS_READWAVE def_readwave;
3864  ks_init_readwave(&def_readwave);
3865  def_readwave.freqoffHz = readwave->freqoffHz;

3869  return SUCCESS;

void ks_plot_host_slicetime_begin ( )
3901  {
3902  if (ks_plot_filefmt == KS_PLOT_OFF) {
3903  return;
3904  }
3905  extern int optr;
3906  extern float pitscan;
3907  char path[250];
3908  char fname[500];
3909  char cmd[300];
3910  ks_plot_host_slicetime_path(path);
3911  ks_plot_host_slicetime_fullfile(fname);
3912 
3913  sprintf(cmd, "mkdir -p %s > /dev/null", path);
3914  system(cmd);
3915  sprintf(fname, "%s%s_slicetime.json", path, ks_psdname);
3916  /* Reset file */
3917  FILE* fp = fopen(fname, "w");
3918  fprintf(fp,
3919  "{\n"
3920  "\"metadata\": {\n"
3921  "\t\"psdname\": \"%s\",\n"
3922  "\t\"optr\": %d,\n"
3923  "\t\"pitscan\": %.0f\n"
3924  "},\n"
3925  "\"passes\": [ {\n"
3926  "\t\"slicegroups\": [\n\t[{},\n\t",
3927  ks_psdname, optr, pitscan);
3928  fclose(fp);
3929 }

3939  if (fp == NULL) {return;}

3942  "{\n\t"
3943  "\"groupdescription\": \"%s\"\n\t"
3944  "}", desc == NULL ? "N/A" : desc);
3945  fputs("],[\n\t{},\n\t", fp);
3946  fflush(fp);
3947  fclose(fp);
3948 }

◆ ks_plot_host_slicetime()

void ks_plot_host_slicetime ( KS_SEQ_CONTROL *  ctrl,
int  nslices,
float *  slicepos_mm,
float  slthick_mm,
KS_PLOT_EXCITATION_MODE  excmode 
)
3984  {
3985  if (ks_plot_filefmt == KS_PLOT_OFF || ctrl->duration <= 0) {
3986  return;
3987  }
3988  static FILE *fp;
3989  int i;
3990  char excmode_str[50];
3991  char fname[1000];
3992 
3993  ks_plot_host_slicetime_fullfile(fname);
3994  switch (excmode) {
3995  case KS_PLOT_STANDARD: strcpy(excmode_str, "KS_PLOT_STANDARD"); break;
3996  case KS_PLOT_NO_EXCITATION: strcpy(excmode_str, "KS_PLOT_NO_EXCITATION"); break;
3997  }
3998 
3999  if (ctrl->duration > 0) {
4000  fp = fopen(fname, "r+");
4001  if (fp == NULL) {return;}
4002  fseek(fp, 0, SEEK_END);
4003  /* fputs(" {\n", fp); */
4004  fprintf(fp,
4005  "{\n"
4006  "\t\t\"description\": \"%s\",\n"
4007  "\t\t\"excitationmode\": \"%s\",\n"
4008  "\t\t\"duration\": %0.3f,\n"
4009  "\t\t\"nseqinstances\": %d,\n"
4010  "\t\t\"minduration\": %0.3f,\n"
4011  "\t\t\"numrf\": %d,\n"
4012  "\t\t\"numtrap\": %d,\n"
4013  "\t\t\"numwave\": %d,\n"
4014  "\t\t\"numacq\": %d,\n"
4015  "\t\t\"slicethickness\": %0.3f,\n"
4016  "\t\t\"slicepos\": [",
4017  ctrl->description, excmode_str, ctrl->duration / 1000.00, ctrl->nseqinstances , ctrl->min_duration / 1000.00, ctrl->gradrf.numrf, ctrl->gradrf.numtrap, ctrl->gradrf.numwave, ctrl->gradrf.numacq, slthick_mm);
4018 
4019  /* SMS slice locations */
4020  for (i = 0; i < (nslices - 1); i++) {
4021  fprintf(fp, "%0.3f, ", slicepos_mm == NULL ? 0.0 : slicepos_mm[i]);
4022  }
4023  fprintf(fp, "%0.3f]\n\t},", slicepos_mm == NULL ? 0.0 : slicepos_mm[nslices - 1]);
4024  fflush(fp);
4025  fclose(fp);
4026  }
4027 
4028 }

◆ ks_plot_host_slicetime_end()

void ks_plot_host_slicetime_end ( )
4031  {
4032  if (ks_plot_filefmt == KS_PLOT_OFF) {
4033  return;
4034  }
4035  char outputdir_uid[250];
4036  char cmd[1000];
4037 
4038  char path[250];
4039  char fname[500];
4040  ks_plot_host_slicetime_path(path);
4041  ks_plot_host_slicetime_fullfile(fname);
4042 
4043  FILE *fp = fopen(fname, "r+");
4044  int fd = fileno(fp);
4045  if (!fp) {return;}
4046  fseek(fp, -28, SEEK_END);
4047  fprintf(fp, "]\n}");
4048  fflush(fp);
4049  ftruncate(fd, ftell(fp));
4050  fclose(fp);
4051 
4052  outputdir_uid[0] = '\0';
4053 #ifdef PSD_HW
4054  /* on MR-scanner */
4055  char outputdir[250];
4056  char pythonpath[] = "/usr/local/bin/apython";
4057  char psdplotpath[] = "/usr/local/bin/psdplot_slicetime.py";
4058  sprintf(outputdir, "/usr/g/mrraw/plot/%s/", ks_psdname);
4059  if (ks_plot_kstmp) {
4060  sprintf(outputdir_uid, "/usr/g/mrraw/kstmp/%010d/plot/", rhkacq_uid);
4061  }
4062 #else
4063  /* in Simulation */
4064  char outputdir[] = "./plot/";
4065  char pythonpath[] = "apython";
4066  char psdplotpath[] = "../KSFoundation/psdplot/psdplot_slicetime.py";
4067 #endif
4068 
4069  sprintf(cmd, "%s %s "
4070  "%s "
4071  "--outputdir %s %s &",
4072  pythonpath, psdplotpath, fname, outputdir, outputdir_uid);
4073  system(cmd);
4074 
4075  return;
4076 }

◆ ks_plot_host_seqctrl_manyplans()

void ks_plot_host_seqctrl_manyplans ( KS_SEQ_CONTROL *  ctrl,
KS_PHASEENCODING_PLAN **  plans,
const int  num_plans 
)
4093  {
4094 
4095  char boardc[7] = "xyzrRto"; /* x,y,z,rho1, theta, omega */
4096  char fname[1000];
4097  char cmd[250];
4098  char outputdir_uid[250];
4099  FILE* fp;
4100  int plan_idx, i, j, w;
4101  KS_SEQLOC loc;
4102  KS_PHASEENCODING_PLAN* plan;
4103 
4104  if (ks_plot_filefmt == KS_PLOT_OFF || ctrl->duration == 0 || ctrl->nseqinstances == 0) {
4105  return;
4106  }
4107 
4108  char fileformat_str[10];
4109  if (ks_plot_filefmt == KS_PLOT_MAKEPDF) { strcpy(fileformat_str, "pdf"); }
4110  else if (ks_plot_filefmt == KS_PLOT_MAKEPNG ) { strcpy(fileformat_str, "png"); }
4111  else if (ks_plot_filefmt == KS_PLOT_MAKESVG ) { strcpy(fileformat_str, "svg"); }
4112 
4113  outputdir_uid[0] = '\0';
4114 
4115 #ifdef PSD_HW
4116  /* on MR-scanner */
4117  char path[250];
4118  sprintf(path, "/usr/g/mrraw/plot/%s/host/", ks_psdname);
4119  if (ks_plot_kstmp) {
4120  sprintf(outputdir_uid, "/usr/g/mrraw/kstmp/%010d/plot/", rhkacq_uid);
4121  }
4122  sprintf(cmd, "mkdir -p %s > /dev/null", outputdir_uid);
4123  system(cmd);
4124  char outputdir[250];
4125  sprintf(outputdir, "/usr/g/mrraw/plot/%s/", ks_psdname);
4126  char pythonpath[] = "/usr/local/bin/apython";
4127  char psdplotpath[] = "/usr/local/bin/psdplot.py";
4128 #ifdef IPG
4129  /* on IPG and on scanner, i.e. we are actually scanning. return quietly */
4130  return;
4131 #endif
4132 #else
4133  /* in Simulation */
4134  char path[] = "./plot/host/";
4135  char outputdir[] = "./plot/";
4136  char pythonpath[] = "apython";
4137  char psdplotpath[] = "../KSFoundation/psdplot/psdplot.py";
4138 #endif
4139  sprintf(cmd, "mkdir -p %s > /dev/null", path);
4140  system(cmd);
4141  if (ctrl->duration <= 0) {
4142  return;
4143  }
4144  /* open files */
4145  sprintf(fname, "%spsdplot_%s_%s.json", path, ks_psdname, ctrl->description);
4146  fp = fopen(fname, "w");
4147  extern _cvfloat _optr;
4148  fprintf(fp, "{\n");
4149  fprintf(fp, "\"metadata\": {\n");
4150  fprintf(fp, "\t\"mode\": \"host\",\n");
4151  fprintf(fp, "\t\"psdname\": \"%s\",\n", ks_psdname);
4152  fprintf(fp, "\t\"sequence\": \"%s\",\n", ctrl->description);
4153  fprintf(fp, "\t\"duration\": %0.3f,\n", ctrl->duration/1000.0);
4154  fprintf(fp, "\t\"min_duration\": %0.3f,\n", ctrl->min_duration/1000.0);
4155  fprintf(fp, "\t\"ssi_time\": %0.3f,\n", ctrl->ssi_time/1000.0);
4156  fprintf(fp, "\t\"momentstart\": %.3f,\n", ctrl->momentstart/1000.0);
4157  fprintf(fp, "\t\"optr_desc\": \"%s\"\n", _optr.descr);
4158  fprintf(fp, "},\n");
4159 
4160  /* PHASE ENCODING PLANS */
4161  fprintf(fp, "\"phaseencplans\": [\n");
4162  for (plan_idx = 0; plan_idx < num_plans; plan_idx++) {
4163  plan = plans[plan_idx];
4164  if (plan) {
4165  fprintf(fp, "{\n");
4166  fprintf(fp, "\t\"description\": \"%s\",\n", plan->description);
4167  fprintf(fp, "\t\"num_shots\": %d,\n", plan->num_shots);
4168  fprintf(fp, "\t\"etl\": %d,\n", plan->etl);
4169  fprintf(fp, "\t\"entries\": [\n");
4170  int echo, shot;
4171  for (shot = 0; shot < plan->num_shots; shot++) {
4172  fprintf(fp, "\t\t[");
4173  for (echo = 0; echo < plan->etl; echo++) {
4174  KS_PHASEENCODING_COORD coord = ks_phaseencoding_get(plan, echo, shot);
4175  fprintf(fp, "[%d, %d]", coord.ky, coord.kz);
4176  if (echo < (plan->etl - 1)) {
4177  fprintf(fp, ", ");
4178  }
4179  }
4180  fprintf(fp, "]");
4181  if (shot < (plan->num_shots - 1)) {
4182  fprintf(fp, ",\n");
4183  }
4184  }
4185  fprintf(fp, "]\n");
4186 
4187  if (plan_idx < (num_plans-1)) {
4188  fprintf(fp, "},\n");
4189  } else {
4190  fprintf(fp, "}\n");
4191  }
4192  }
4193  }
4194  fprintf(fp, "],\n");
4195 
4196  /* TRAPEZOIDS */
4197  fprintf(fp, "\"frames\": [\n");
4198  fprintf(fp, "{},\n");
4199  fprintf(fp, "{\n\"trapz\": {\n");
4200  for (i = 0; i < ctrl->gradrf.numtrap; i++) { /* each unique trap object */
4201  KS_TRAP* trap = ctrl->gradrf.trapptr[i];
4202  fprintf(fp, "\t\"%s\": {\n", trap->description);
4203  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"ramptime\": %0.3f,\n", trap->ramptime / 1000.0);
4204  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"plateautime\": %0.3f,\n", trap->plateautime / 1000.0);
4205  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"duration\": %0.3f,\n", trap->duration / 1000.0);
4206  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"amp\": %0.6f,\n", trap->amp);
4207  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"instances\": [{\n");
4208 
4209  for (j = 0; j < trap->base.ninst; j++) { /* each instance of the trap */
4210  loc = trap->locs[j];
4211  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"board\": \"%c\",\n", boardc[loc.board]);
4212  fprintf(fp,"\t\t\t\"time\": %0.3f,\n", loc.pos / 1000.0);
4213  fprintf(fp,"\t\t\t\"rtscale\": %0.6f,\n", (trap->rtscale == NULL) ? 1.0f : trap->rtscale[j]);
4214  fprintf(fp,"\t\t\t\"ampscale\": %0.6f\n", loc.ampscale);
4215  if (j == (trap->base.ninst -1)) {
4216  fprintf(fp, "\t\t}]\n");
4217  } else {
4218  fprintf(fp, "\t\t},{\n");
4219  }
4220 
4221  }
4222  if (i == (ctrl->gradrf.numtrap -1)) {
4223  fprintf(fp, "\t}\n");
4224  } else {
4225  fprintf(fp, "\t},\n");
4226  }
4227  }
4228  fprintf(fp, "},\n");
4229 
4230  /* ACQUISITIONS */
4231  fprintf(fp, "\"acquisitions\": [\n");
4232  for (i = 0; i < ctrl->gradrf.numacq; i++) { /* Each unique KS_READ object */
4233  KS_READ* acq = ctrl->gradrf.readptr[i];
4234  fprintf(fp, "\t{\n");
4235  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"description\": \"%s\",\n", acq->description);
4236  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"duration\": %0.3f,\n", acq->duration / 1000.0);
4237  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"rbw\": %0.3f,\n", acq->rbw);
4238  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"samples\": %d,\n", acq->filt.outputs);
4239  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"time\": [");
4240  for (j = 0; j < acq->base.ninst; ++j) {
4241  fprintf(fp, "%0.3f", acq->pos[j] / 1000.0);
4242  if (j == (acq->base.ninst -1)) {
4243  fprintf(fp, "]\n");
4244  } else {
4245  fprintf(fp, ", ");
4246  }
4247  }
4248  if (i == (ctrl->gradrf.numacq -1)) {
4249  fprintf(fp, "\t}\n");
4250  } else {
4251  fprintf(fp, "\t},\n");
4252  }
4253  }
4254  fprintf(fp, "],\n");
4255 
4256  /* RF (RHO1) */
4257  fprintf(fp, "\"rf\": {\n");
4258  for (i = 0; i < ctrl->gradrf.numrf; i++) { /* each unique RF object */
4259  KS_RF* rfptr = ctrl->gradrf.rfptr[i];
4260  if (rfptr->rfwave.res > 0) {
4261  char roledesc[50];
4262  if (rfptr->role == KS_RF_ROLE_EXC) {
4263  strcpy(roledesc,"KS_RF_ROLE_EXC");
4264  } else if (rfptr->role == KS_RF_ROLE_REF) {
4265  strcpy(roledesc,"KS_RF_ROLE_REF");
4266  } else if (rfptr->role == KS_RF_ROLE_SPSAT) {
4267  strcpy(roledesc,"KS_RF_ROLE_SPSAT");
4268  } else if (rfptr->role == KS_RF_ROLE_CHEMSAT) {
4269  strcpy(roledesc, "KS_RF_ROLE_CHEMSAT");
4270  } else if (rfptr->role == KS_RF_ROLE_INV) {
4271  strcpy(roledesc, "KS_RF_ROLE_INV");
4272  } else if (rfptr->role == KS_RF_ROLE_SPSAT) {
4273  strcpy(roledesc, "KS_RF_ROLE_SPSAT");
4274  } else {
4275  strcpy(roledesc,"NONE");
4276  }
4277  fprintf(fp, "\t\"%s\": {\n", rfptr->rfwave.description);
4278  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"description\": \"%s\",\n", rfptr->rfwave.description);
4279  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"flipangle\": %0.3f,\n", rfptr->flip);
4280  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"nominal_flipangle\": %0.3f,\n", rfptr->rfpulse.nom_fa);
4281  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"max_b1\": %0.6f,\n", rfptr->rfpulse.max_b1);
4282  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"amp\": %0.6f,\n", rfptr->amp);
4283  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"isodelay\": %0.3f,\n", rfptr->start2iso / 1000.0);
4284  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"duration\": %0.3f,\n", rfptr->rfwave.duration / 1000.0);
4285  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"role\": \"%s\",\n", roledesc);
4286 
4287  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"omega\": {\n");
4288  if (rfptr->omegawave.res > 0) {
4289  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"description\": \"%s\",\n", rfptr->omegawave.description);
4290  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"duration\": %0.3f,\n", rfptr->omegawave.duration / 1000.0);
4291  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"waveform\": [0.0,");
4292  for (w = 0; w < rfptr->omegawave.res; w++) {
4293  fprintf(fp, "%0.6f,", rfptr->omegawave.waveform[w]);
4294  }
4295  fprintf(fp, "0.0],\n");
4296  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"instances\": [{\n");
4297  for (j = 0; j < rfptr->omegawave.base.ninst; j++) {
4298  loc = rfptr->omegawave.locs[j];
4299  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\t\"time\": %0.3f,\n", loc.pos/1000.0);
4300  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\t\"board\": \"%c\",\n", boardc[loc.board]);
4301  fprintf(fp,"\t\t\t\t\"rtscale\": %0.6f,\n", (rfptr->omegawave.rtscale == NULL) ? 1.0f : rfptr->omegawave.rtscale[j]);
4302  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\t\"ampscale\": %0.6f\n", loc.ampscale);
4303  if (j == (rfptr->omegawave.base.ninst -1)) {
4304  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t}]\n");
4305  } else {
4306  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t},{\n");
4307  }
4308  }
4309  }
4310  fprintf(fp, "\t\t},\n"); /* Omega */
4311 
4312  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"theta\": {\n");
4313  if (rfptr->thetawave.res > 0) {
4314  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"description\": \"%s\",\n", rfptr->thetawave.description);
4315  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"duration\": %0.3f,\n", rfptr->thetawave.duration / 1000.0);
4316  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"waveform\": [0.0,");
4317  for (w = 0; w < rfptr->thetawave.res; w++) {
4318  fprintf(fp, "%0.6f,", rfptr->thetawave.waveform[w]);
4319  }
4320  fprintf(fp, "0.0],\n");
4321  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"instances\": [{\n");
4322  for (j = 0; j < rfptr->thetawave.base.ninst; j++) {
4323  loc = rfptr->thetawave.locs[j];
4324  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\t\"time\": %0.3f,\n", loc.pos/1000.0);
4325  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\t\"board\": \"%c\",\n", boardc[loc.board]);
4326  fprintf(fp,"\t\t\t\t\"rtscale\": %0.6f,\n", (rfptr->omegawave.rtscale == NULL) ? 1.0f : rfptr->omegawave.rtscale[j]);
4327  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\t\"ampscale\": %0.6f\n", loc.ampscale);
4328  if (j == (rfptr->thetawave.base.ninst -1)) {
4329  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t}]\n");
4330  } else {
4331  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t},{\n");
4332  }
4333  }
4334  }
4335  fprintf(fp, "\t\t},\n"); /* Theta */
4336 
4337  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"waveform\": [0.0,");
4338  for (w = 0; w < rfptr->rfwave.res; w++) {
4339  fprintf(fp, "%0.6f,", rfptr->rfwave.waveform[w]);
4340  }
4341  fprintf(fp, "0.0],\n");
4342  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"instances\": [{\n");
4343  for (j = 0; j < rfptr->rfwave.base.ninst; j++) { /* each instance of the wave (RHO1) */
4344  loc = rfptr->rfwave.locs[j];
4345  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"time\": %0.3f,\n", loc.pos/1000.0);
4346  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"board\": \"%c\",\n", boardc[loc.board]);
4347  fprintf(fp,"\t\t\t\"rtscale\": %0.6f,\n", (rfptr->rfwave.rtscale == NULL) ? 1.0f : rfptr->rfwave.rtscale[j]);
4348  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"ampscale\": %0.6f\n", loc.ampscale);
4349  if (j == (rfptr->rfwave.base.ninst -1)) {
4350  fprintf(fp, "\t\t}]\n");
4351  } else {
4352  fprintf(fp, "\t\t},{\n");
4353  }
4354  }
4355 
4356  if (i == (ctrl->gradrf.numrf -1)) {
4357  fprintf(fp, "\t}\n");
4358  } else {
4359  fprintf(fp, "\t},\n");
4360  }
4361  } /* res > 0 */
4362  } /* rf */
4363  fprintf(fp, "},\n");
4364 
4365  fprintf(fp, "\"waves\": {\n");
4366  /* other (non-RF) waves */
4367  for (i = 0; i < ctrl->gradrf.numwave; i++) {
4368  KS_WAVE* waveptr = ctrl->gradrf.waveptr[i];
4369  if (waveptr->res > 0) {
4370  fprintf(fp, "\t\"%s\": {\n", waveptr->description);
4371  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"description\": \"%s\",\n", waveptr->description);
4372  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"duration\": %0.3f,\n", waveptr->duration / 1000.0);
4373  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"waveform\": [0.0,");
4374  for (w = 0; w < waveptr->res; w++) {
4375  fprintf(fp, "%0.6f,", waveptr->waveform[w]);
4376  }
4377  fprintf(fp, "0.0],\n");
4378 
4379  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\"instances\": [{\n");
4380  for (j = 0; j < waveptr->base.ninst; j++) { /* each instance of the wave */
4381  loc = waveptr->locs[j];
4382  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"board\": \"%c\",\n", boardc[loc.board]);
4383  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"time\": %0.3f,\n", loc.pos/1000.0);
4384  fprintf(fp,"\t\t\t\"rtscale\": %0.6f,\n", (waveptr->rtscale == NULL) ? 1.0f : waveptr->rtscale[j]);
4385  fprintf(fp, "\t\t\t\"ampscale\": %0.6f\n", loc.ampscale);
4386  if (j == (waveptr->base.ninst -1)) {
4387  fprintf(fp, "\t\t}]\n");
4388  } else {
4389  fprintf(fp, "\t\t},{\n");
4390  }
4391  }
4392  if (i == (ctrl->gradrf.numwave -1)) {
4393  fprintf(fp, "\t}\n");
4394  } else {
4395  fprintf(fp, "\t},\n");
4396  }
4397  } /* res > 0 */
4398  }
4399  fprintf(fp, "}\n"); /* End waves */
4400  fprintf(fp, "}\n"); /* End frame */
4401  fprintf(fp, "]\n"); /* End frames */
4402  fprintf(fp, "}"); /* End */
4403  fflush(fp);
4404  fclose(fp);
4405 
4406  {
4407  char cmd[1000];
4408  sprintf(cmd, "%s %s %s "
4409  "--outputdir %s %s &",
4410  pythonpath, psdplotpath, fname,
4411  outputdir, outputdir_uid);
4412  system(cmd);
4413 #ifdef PSD_HW
4414  sprintf(cmd, "cp %s*.json %s > /dev/null", path, outputdir_uid);
4415  system(cmd);
4416 #endif
4417  }
4418  return;
4419 }
